posts.post_title: Looking for Sporting News Supplement Cobb/Wagner
posts.post_content: Please let me know if you have one available. I want the Cobb/Wagner shaking hands.

[quote name="orly57" post=1790143]Please let me know if you have one available. I want the Cobb/Wagner shaking hands.[/QUOTE]

I have nine of them if you need.  But you'll pay through the nose.
I’m on a net54 BST Jeff, I fully expect to pay through the nose, as well as various other orafices. Too bad these don’t come in OC, or I could catch a deal though.
